about_the_game:
SNOWMAN from OUTER SPACE!

Snowman from Outer Space appeared in nearby mountains!
Save yourself or Fight them if You dare!

This unique DLC for SEARCH AND RESCUE brings new type of gameplay, little horror and sci-fi adventure.

This DLC offers:
⛄ Scenario can be used on every Map - National Parks or Procedural.
⛄ Weapons against Snowman invasion!
⛄ New Content and Features like Cards.

Enjoy Snowman from Outer Space and SEARCH AND RESCUE, Stay Safe and Good Luck on Trails!
detailed_description:
SNOWMAN from OUTER SPACE!

Snowman from Outer Space appeared in nearby mountains!
Save yourself or Fight them if You dare!

This unique DLC for SEARCH AND RESCUE brings new type of gameplay, little horror and sci-fi adventure.

This DLC offers:
⛄ Scenario can be used on every Map - National Parks or Procedural.
⛄ Weapons against Snowman invasion!
⛄ New Content and Features like Cards.

Enjoy Snowman from Outer Space and SEARCH AND RESCUE, Stay Safe and Good Luck on Trails!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel® i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel® i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: SEARCH AND RESCUE: Snowman From Outer Space

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
